nodes.text: Sarkhai was a Mid Rim planet covered with forests where Force-sensitives were uncommon. It belonged to the Galactic Republic. Senator Tobas Grell and his daughter Nadia were native to Sarkhai. Around the time of the Cold War, Sarkhai was ruled by the King Sethun and his wife, the Queen Nyscha. The planet was one of the members of a secessionist movement called the Rift Alliance. Although unlike most members, Sarkhai only joined out of curiosity and had no particular reason to secede from the Republic.
